title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if the combo list is dropped down, it will take focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
